properties.entry: SELECT LODGE_NO, LODGE_NAME, LODGE_LOCATION, PRICE, LODGE_INFO FROM MONTH_INFO WHERE LODGE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO MONTH_RESERVATION VALUES( SEQ_RESERV_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT )
SELECT RESERVATION_NO, LODGE_NO, MEM_NO, START_DATE, PEOPLE_NUM, PRICE FROM MONTH_RESERVATION JOIN MONTH_INFO USING(LODGE_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO
UPDATE MONTH_RESERVATION SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE RESERVATION_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
